channel.title: All I have to say about devolution
channel.description:
WE dont have a server discussion board so this is going here:
Devolution 2.7 looks great.
Here is some shit:
You cannot leave it running all night without it nulling all the players online and the server.
The next day you fix the reason.
Happens again.
Fix taht reason.
Happens again.
It's a complete waste of time to use and it is no wonder everyone uses delta. Atleast delta doesnt crash constantly and destroy all your char files. When delta nulls it destroys the char file that did it only.

item.title: All I have to say about devolution
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

I left it for a bit, but gotta lock now bud.

Read full topic

item.title: All I have to say about devolution
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

Im using ddsspeced source from delta, just started yesterdy. I am a coder but i can see only 20 mistakes that i fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: All I have to say about devolution
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Hey, Jordie I am just having a rant cause I am pissed, K?

Read full topic
item.source: All I have to say about devolution

item.title: All I have to say about devolution
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Tatemo:

Nope, I would honestly say. Czar nulls a heck of a lot less than devo does. I think what Killamess’s problem was is he wrote his code really fast. It would have been amazing but he didnt pay enough attention to detail. So he missed some important error handlings. There are 1000s of typos etc. That have fatal effects. Like in Drops sometimes he puts the npcid numbers wrong etc. It is all very sad

Partially why I would never use any P-Czar source past Dodian. Even Dodian is iffy.

Read full topic
item.source: All I have to say about devolution

item.title: All I have to say about devolution
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

I have spent. Every single day. Since hosting the game. Waking up to the server nulled and all char files deleted. I look at the error logs oh fancy that some shitty code by killamess that fucks up because he has no concept of error handling or large amounts of players. I fix it, it happens again. AND AGAIN AND AGAIN!

Read full topic
item.source: All I have to say about devolution
